official_title: To amend titles 41 and 10 of the United States Code to establish certain procurement procedures with respect to businesses wholly-owned through an ESOP, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
ESOP Business Act of 2018

This bill gives businesses wholly owned though an employee stock ownership plan various advantages when bidding for executive agency procurement contracts.
